forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High 22C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High around 75F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds. Low near 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 16C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 64F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. High around 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Thunder possible. High 52F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain...mixing with snow late. Thunder is possible early. Low 3C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Thunder is possible early. Low 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. Thunder possible. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High around 50F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early transitioning to snow showers late. Thunder possible. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Thunder possible. Low 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 51F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early, becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 12C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning, becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low around 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 11C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High around 55F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -1C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 31F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High around 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low -1C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early transitioning to snow showers late. Low 32F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Moderating temperatures will change morning snow showers to rain showers by late day. High 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High around 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intermittent snow showers, especially early. Low -2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Rain and snow showers in the evening. A few snow showers late. Low around 30F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High near 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 53F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow tapering off in the evening. Decreasing cloudiness late. Low -1C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain or snow showers in the evening will give way to partly cloudy skies late. Low 32F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.
